trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of all [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elements in a project.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de todos os [UsingTask](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elementos em um projeto.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todo o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref> para um unidimensional compatível <xref:System.Array>de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"> </xref> objetos, iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"></xref> objects that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"> </xref> objetos que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todo o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref> para um unidimensional compatível <xref:System.Array>, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o número de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask>objeto na coleção representa um elemento no projeto.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask>

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o número de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que itera por meio de <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que o chamador usar o `foreach` instrução de linguagem c# (`for each` na [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) para iterar pelos <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask>objetos em <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> individuais

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>para todo o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se acessar para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (thread-safe); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection"> </xref>.
